import React, {useState, Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Navbar from "../navbar/Navbar" import './Home.css' class Home extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {books: [], isLoading:false}; } async componentDidMount() { const response = await fetch('/cata/user'); const body = await response.text(); if (body === '') { this.setState(({isAuthenticated: false})) } else { this.setState({isAuthenticated: true, user: JSON.parse(body)}) } } render() { const {books,isLoading} = this.state; if(isLoading) { return
